mapper.insert: insert into board(userId, boardTitle, boardContents, hashTag) values (#{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{hashTag})
mapper.update: update board set boardContents = #{boardContents}, boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, hashTag = #{hashTag} where boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: select * from board order by boardNum desc limit #{pageFirstBoardNum}, #{boardNumPerPage};
select count(*) from board where boardNum = #{boardNum}
select boardNum, userId, boardTitle, boardContents, hashTag from board where boardNum = #{boardNum};
